directions.2: Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt.
directions.3: Mix until creamy the shortening, sugar and egg.
directions.4: Mix the flour mixture into the shortening mixture alternating with sour cream and vanilla.
directions.5: Drop dough by tablespoon onto greased cookie sheet 2 inches apart.
directions.6: Combine the cinnamon with 1 tablespoon and sprinkle on top.

directions.2: Mix together the cake mix, pudding mix, poppy seeds, oil and water.
directions.3: Add eggs one at a time mixing well after each.
directions.4: Add the vanilla and mix well.
directions.5: In a separate bowl mix the sugar and cinnamon.
directions.6: Sprinkle the sugar mixture into a greased bundt cake pan coating well.
directions.8: In a separate bowl mix powdered sugar and lemon juice until you have a thin mixture.
directions.9: Let cake cool for 5 minutes then glaze with the powdered sugar mixture.

directions.2: Add the chicken broth and chicken to the pot breaking the chicken apart to almost shredded.
directions.3: Set burner to high and start cooking.
directions.4: Stir in garbanzo beans mashing them a little.
directions.5: Add the black beans, Rotel, corn and spices and stir well.
directions.6: Heat until it just begins to boil then reduce heat and let simmer for 5 minutes.
directions.7: Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes.
directions.8: Top each bowl with shredded cheese and tortilla chips.

required.ingredient: Italian of French bread, 3⁄4 inch thick

directions.1: The night before, arrange bread in a single layer in a 9 inch square baking dish.
directions.2: In a small bowl beat eggs, milk, granulated sugar, salt and vanilla until blended and pour over bread. Turn slices to coat evenly.
directions.3: Cover and refrigerate overnight.
directions.4: The next morning, melt butter in a skillet and saut√© bread 4 to 5 minute on each side until golden.
directions.5: Sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve with syrup or sour cream and preserves or berries.

directions.1: Combine water and soup mix. Heat to boil then reduce heat to med-low.
directions.2: Add milk, tortellini, spinach and spices.
directions.3: Cook 5 to 6 minutes or until tortellini is tender.
directions.4: Serve in bowl and top with parmesan cheese.

directions.2: Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt.
directions.3: Mix until creamy the shortening, sugar and egg.
directions.4: Mix the flour mixture into the shortening mixture alternating with sour cream and vanilla.

directions.6: Combine the cinnamon with 1 tablespoon and sprinkle on top.

directions.8: In a separate bowl mix powdered sugar and lemon juice until you have a thin mixture.
directions.9: Let cake cool for 5 minutes then glaze with the powdered sugar mixture.

directions.4: Stir in garbanzo beans mashing them a little.
